attributes.action: End parades commission dictatorship in northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
Under current legislation the parades commission in northern Ireland is continuing to punish the Protestant community by imposing unfair and unjust restrictions on the Protestant culture
For over a hundred the protestant people have been parading the streets of northern Ireland
Sinn Fein with the help of the parades commission are working towards eradicating every aspect of this culture which we have a basic human right to enjoy in peace
